name: Just Jump (itch) (OdazDev)
description:
A simple infinite runner and jump game. You're just a corporate slave trying to run since you are late! Just jump over that OBSTACLES!

  • WASD/ Arrow keys movement. 
  • Spacebar to jump
  • You also have the ability to dash/superspeed using Left Shift.
  • Obstacle will spawn randomly and if you hit one it's game over.
  • You can score by just surviving over time.
